introduction: Can our universe destroy itself? Everything in the universe strives to be in the most stable state p

vocabulary.definition: to make great efforts to achieve or obtain something
vocabulary.example: She strives to be the best student in her class.

vocabulary.definition: not firmly fixed, liable to change or fail
vocabulary.example: The chair was so unstable that it tipped over easily.

vocabulary.definition: forming a necessary base or core; of central importance
vocabulary.example: Learning basic math skills is fundamental to understanding advanced mathematics.

vocabulary.definition: based on an assumption or guess; not proven
vocabulary.example: Hypothetically speaking, if we had more time, we could finish the project.
The superhero had the power of annihilating any enemy that crossed his path.

vocabulary.definition: a very small piece of something
vocabulary.example: Scientists study the behavior of particles at the subatomic level.
